title: Kubernetes MCP Server
description: Full MCP server for K8s cluster management: pods, deployments, services, logs

title: Notion → Markdown Export Kit
description: A kit that exports Notion pages/databases to clean Markdown with frontmatter, preserving headings, tables, and code blocks.
acceptanceCriteria: Export a page to Markdown with YAML frontmatter
Handle basic tables and code blocks
Support database export to a folder of Markdown files

title: Supabase Auth + Row Level Security Starter
description: A minimal starter kit demonstrating Supabase auth flows plus RLS policies for multi-tenant data access (org_id scoping).
acceptanceCriteria: Includes local dev instructions + seed data

title: GitHub Issue Triage Agent
description: An agent workflow that labels, deduplicates, and drafts responses for new GitHub issues using a repo's CONTRIBUTING.md + templates.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect likely duplicates and link them
Draft a friendly response with next steps

title: Stripe Billing Webhooks Kit
description: A kit that verifies Stripe webhook signatures and persists subscription status changes with idempotency and retries.

title: PDF Extraction Pipeline (Tables + Citations)
description: A pipeline that extracts text + tables from PDFs, preserves citation anchors, and outputs structured JSON for downstream RAG.
acceptanceCriteria: Extract tables into a normalized JSON schema
Provide a CLI with batch processing

title: Browser Agent Smoke-Test Harness
description: A lightweight harness that runs scripted browser flows (login, checkout, search) and produces a pass/fail report with screenshots.

title: OpenAPI → Tool Schema Converter
description: Convert an OpenAPI 3.0 spec into a set of tool schemas usable by agent runtimes (name, description, parameters).
acceptanceCriteria: CLI with input URL or local file
